about_the_game:
Welcome to Fintube!


This software tool, much like Veadotube, is incredibly simple and user-friendly, designed specifically for PNGTubers.

With FinTube, you can effortlessly bring your characters to life, making your content engaging for your audience.





What can Fintube do?

Fintube comes with all amazing feature but also incredibly simple and user-friendly. We designed it with primary focus on PNGTubers beginner. Future development of Fintube will focus on simplifying the content creation process for PNGTubers.

Some of the current feature of Fintube:

  • Easy to use and straightforward
  • Doesn't require much from your computer to work
  • Supports import of JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF (Experimental) image file formats
  • Streamer mode for streaming
  • Expresive UI to spice up the experience
  • Avatar movement based on voice input from microphone
  • A slider to set db state limits
  • Thumbnail preview of the imported image
  • Streamer Mode can now use "Allow Transparency" in Source>Game Capture>OBS Properties by accessing the button
  • Multiple Expression Keys (Hotkeys) for changing between each mode/layer using keyboard
  • More to come in the future!



We will update you about our progress on the monthly
Follow our devlog for more detail.

Also don't forget to follow us for our weekly freebies.

We understand that this is still an early stage of development, and there may be some bugs or issues that need to be addressed. We appreciate your input, as it will greatly assist us in improving our next update.

If you have a suggestion for a feature for the app just write a comment below.

This project is still under development, if you like the project, please wishlist us on here!

Feel free to direct message me for inquiries regarding questions.

This software tool, much like Veadotube, is incredibly simple and user-friendly, designed specifically for PNGTubers.

name: Fintube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64bit (10.0, Build 18363)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N2840 @ 2.16GHz (2CPUs), ~2.2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Microphone and 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fintube: Elevate your PNGTuber experience! Easily import images, animate avatars with voice input, and enhance engagement with streamer mode and expressive UI. Stay updated, enjoy weekly freebies, and shape our development with your feedback. Wishlist for an evolving PNGTubing journey!
